title: *RC is the rate of construction in respect of RCC Construction and Land Rate (LR) is the rate of open Land for FSI 1
clause_text: *RC is the rate of construction in respect of RCC Construction and Land Rate (LR) is the rate of open Land for FSI 1. FSI to be sanctioned on a Slum Rehabilitation scheme site may exceed 3.

source_pdf.text_snippet: *RC is the rate of construction in respect of RCC Construction and Land Rate (LR) is the rate of open Land for FSI 1.
